title: 81. Getting to the Root of Your Acne + Common Triggers with CLEARSTEM.
description:
In this episode, I chat with CLEARSTEM founders, Holistic Nutritionist Kayleigh Christina, and Danielle Gronich, esthetician and CEO of the San Diego Acne Clinic. We break down some of the biggest acne triggers out there like:

- birth control 

- supplements

- specific foods 

- pore clogging ingredients

and more! 

Learn more about CLEARSTEM.

Danielle's IG.
